descriptions.description: PropertyDataChangeRequest

AccquiredBY value supplied by UI is not utilised in this task. As this is a task assigned to the direct manager of the initiator, SupervisorId (variable) will contain the value of the Supervisor who has actuallly acted on the human task.
Assign Data from PDCRReqPDO to HumanTaskPDO Housekeeping - SupervisorId (variable) is set to Null before starting the task.

Assign Data from PDCRReqPDO to HumanTaskPDO. Housekeeping - AccquiredBy is set to Null before starting the task. 17June : Changed From : concat("SupervisingAppraiser",bpmn:getDataObject('InitiatorDistrict'),',',"PrincipalAppraiser",bpmn:getDataObject('InitiatorDistrict'),',',"ChiefAppraiser") Changed To : ==================== OATS - 15196 resulted in following chage to Review Task - Changed from - concat("SupervisingAppraiser",bpmn:getDataObject('AINDistrict')/ns:ainDistrict,',',"PrincipalAppraiser",bpmn:getDataObject('AINDistrict')/ns:ainDistrict,',',"ChiefAppraiser") Changed To -
Assign Data from PDCRReqPDO to HumanTaskPDO Housekeeping - AccquiredBy is set to Null before starting the task.

UI Response - UI Respo se should include following - accquiredBy - This is the user-id of the participant who has accquired the human task (from Pool) and have actually hit an action. This value will be assigned to (ReviewedBy colun in WFLog Table)
SupervisorAccquired Variable set to false.
If it;s Accquired, then Upon Submit from Appraiser, the task should reach to the Supervisor, who has Accquired the ReviewPDCR task and performed action (Reject or Assign)
If it;s NOT Accquired, then Upon Submit from Appraiser, the task should reach to the Supervisor, who has acted on the SubmitPDCR task and performed action (Reject or Assign)
This activity lso Resets the AssignmentBox variables.
UpdatePDCRService call
Wait for a minute for human task assignment to be completed
If it;s Accquired, then Upon Submit from Appraiser, the task should reach to the Supervisor, who has Accquired the ReviewPDCR task and performed action (Reject or Assign)
Remove this activity after testing
Remove this activity after testing

Principal Appraisers are made the Owners because SubmitPDCR will be WITHDRAW by an Supervisor, hence Review Task will be assigned to Supervisors from AIN district. And then Review tasks owners will be PAs.

Following attributes from OriginalRealPropertyInfo are assigned to SortPDCRPDO. These attributes must be passed from SortPDCRPDO to Human Task Input attribute 'sortPDCR'
Check Should is EditPDCR or CreatePDCR. Based on that human task is routed to a signle user or a group.
Once Appraiser Submit, then check if the task is accquired by an supervisor or a direct supervisor has acted on it. If it;s accquired, route it to ReviewPDCR task else to ManagePDCR task.

Adding Source check after Bullpen discussion with Ann and Darlene on 29th Aug. They want the FYI to go to internal users, only when it's EditPDCR. Thanks
OATS Issue 15456 Realised as follows - If Source = Public Service Request then check if email exists. If email exists then send email to email address and send FYI to the intiaitor.

labels.label: ACTION TYPE = "UPDATE" or "UPDATE AND MANUAL PROCESSING"

descriptions.description: If ACTION TYPE = "UPDATE" or "MANUAL PROCESSING", then update the information in the database.

labels.label: ACTION TYPE = "NO CHANGE" or "NO CHANGE AND MANUAL PROCESSING"

descriptions.description: If ACTION TYPE = "NO CHANGE" OR ACTION TYPE = "NO CHANGE AND MANUAL PROCESSING" , don't update the information in the database
